main.name: Hi, I am Aaron
main.description: Love designing and building user-friendly products to improve the efficiency of software teams. Now I am seeking a Senior UI/UX Engineer position
main.bio: My last title was a team leader, 7-year experience in software development, both backend and front-end, 5-year React.JS experience, and a big fan of it, more than 4-year focused on cloud-native. Love designing and building user-friendly products to improve the efficiency of software teams. Now I am seeking a full-time product-oriented position as a Senior UI/UX Engineer.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.
